Description:
Detects attempts to record audio with arecord utility

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Audio Capture
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'execve' and a0 = 'arecord' and a1 = '-vv' and a2 = '-fdat'
